name: Tie Die
description:
A game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the dice". Made over 48 hours with an Axolotl friend of mine.

In Tie Die you play as a penguin who has been bestowed the... tie die, an ancient garment which allows you to win in combat by tying with your opponent.

Play dice and spells to even the playing field and tie your opponent in this strategy card game.

Art and Soundtrack - Axolotl

Fonts Used: 

  • ModeSeven Font by Andrew Bulhak (https://www.fontspace.com/modeseven-font-f2369)
  • Marsneveneksk Font by Marsnev (https://www.1001freefonts.com/marsneveneksk.font)
